text: heads up, im at water ave for a meeting, might be done by 10 shout here if ya need anything though

<!channel> - an update from footage standpoint. I shot a bunch on Friday from home. That’s already been posted in Drive. I also shot some more this morning on our big TV that I’ve dumped onto the Lacie. LMK if any of it is helpful.
awesome.  <@U02F9CXTL> and <@U0J6TE0CA> assuming youre good to hit the ground running.  if ya need anything though, shout.
were good

<!here|@here> lets share out uts and context before you head out today.  y’all are grooving, we’re just trying to layer some of the thinking.  <@U0J6TE0CA> and <@U02F9CXTL> are in the edit seats though and they got this

<!channel> - reminder that I have Jury Duty tomorrow (and hopefully ONLY tomorrow). If there’s anything that’s needed from me, please let me know by EOD and I’ll do my best to get it to you before tomorrow. 

Things I know: 
• There’s a bunch of footage shot of top sweep stuff - posted weekend stuff to GDrive, today’s is on the Lacie. 
• Exported a longer version of the song. 

Things I don’t know: 
• How any of the above worked/is working/if we need alterations. 

Let me know. Thanks all!
awesome.  <@U02F9CXTL> and @emily when you export the cut tonight, include answers to the above in the context doc.
<@U0265G76F> there are plans to try to swap some of your Top Sweep pick ups with AE exports.  Will see what that does to the fidelity/asthetic
Pow-wow quick guys?

<!here|@here> Update:
<@U0J6TE0CA> is porting the edit over to Premier.  It’s my understanding this will be done for tomorrow morning.
Before she did so she kicked out another export: 
<https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B2saO1SetZcbaUpGUHZGalZUM0E>
*Best one yet*  Includes the latest music.

The only things I see that we discussed:
1.  Are we going to try to show people’s relationship with Top Sweep?
2.  We have to update final title card to just be Uncorked.  What’s involved here?
3.  We still have to swap some pick up shots with AE inserts.
4.  Sup with color and steadying?  That come after next round of cuts?

Anything else?  Please advise.
Wait, when did we decide the final title card was just going to be Uncorked?
Oh you mean the logo section
Nothing really involved.
Coloring & compositing come after final edit
From my impression, and correct me if I am wrong <@U0265G76F> <@U0260V4K1> <@U02F9CXTL> we are still giving a nod to context of the relationship with Top Sweep
if possible

<@U0J6TE0CA> thats or you to tell us whats possible.  not trying to overdo it.  and as for final title card: we’ve known since last week that it has to end on just uncorked, no mention f google.  looking for you to advise on what you want to do to animate that (so we can make a decision of how much time to invest)
I personally think it's important, yes it can be done
Now i need to dart for Aerial!

The only things I see that we discussed:
1.  Are we going to try to show people’s relationship with Top Sweep?

Yes

2.  We have to update final title card to just be Uncorked.  What’s involved here?

Depends on our direction. Last thought was to have the logo animate - then film it. I can play some treatments - kick starter thoughts

3.  We still have to swap some pick up shots with AE inserts.

Yep

4.  Sup with color and steadying?  That come after next round of cuts?

After cuts.

:slightly_smiling_face:
Thanks Jason. Supa helpful.
